name: carrageenan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a substance found in seaweed (= a plant that grows in the sea) that is used in food, drink, and medicines, especially to make them thicker: The drink is made from coconut water, coconut cream, cocoa, vanilla and carrageenan. A seaweed component known as carrageenan is the active component in this product.
More examplesFewer examplesOnce a gel is formed using carrageenan, it is very stable and can be taken through a range of temperatures. The texture comes from stabilizers such as carrageenan, pectin, and xanthan gum. A gelling agent extracted from seaweed by boiling, carrageenan can be found in ice cream and yogurts.
